capsules.label: Medieval High Court
capsules.heritage_context: Inspired by 14th-century European court attire with sumptuous brocades, structured bodices, and heraldic motifs.
signature_garments: corseted bodice layered over quilted underdress
environment_staging: neo-gothic gallery with stained glass lighting
ultra-modern runway framed by pointed arches
fusion_strategies: translate houppelande volume into asymmetric couture cape
reinterpret heraldic motifs as metallic appliqué panels
swap traditional corsetry for sculpted power-bodice with mesh inserts
follow_up: Dial up crown silhouette with avant-garde millinery
Experiment with monochrome palette to emphasize shape
